comments.comment: I AGREE

The letter to judge Ilancheliyan says the husband has given Rs. 1,170,000 to a friend without documents and the friend has escaped to Switzerland and denied borrowing any money. That was the reason for husband's suicide. It is foolish to give such a large amount of money without documents, just based on trust. Then, committing suicide when money is lost is cowardice. If that is the right thing, then how many people should have committed suicide after Tsunami? The mother killed the three innocent children, which is murder. I have no sympathy for such people.
Hitan marana gedara yayida hitan...meka jathika sanhidiyawata gatha haki honda piyawarak...
100 % agree... Ara lamainge moonu dakkama mage ahatath kadulu awa...

Majority of Northern people are struggling with poverty caused by the pre and post war. Where is the income generation for them? No jobs or industries developed yet in that area. They are Sri Lankans regardless the ethnicity and its our politicians responsibility to create some immediate solutions without fighting with each other for power.
It is politicians in nothern province who dont allow industry developments in these areas. They survive only if these poor people remain poor forever.
I agree, one more thing This new constitution will solve all of this. that's why no it is number one priority

please explain how the new constitution can help them

‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂±‡∑í ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂Ω‡∑ì ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑Ñ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑î ! In USA UK and other developed countries loan sharks are illegal. Only banks can give loans. If you are bankrupt. All loans will be closed and you can not take any more loans. Don't have to die.

Even in the UK there are loan sharks. These loan Companies like "Provident" and "Pay Day Loans" to mention a few are loan sharks but the loan sharks cannot use illegal methods to recover unpaid instalments since there are laws prohibiting harassment and intimidation of course they can take court action to recover and the worse scenario would be a person who failed to pay might become bankrupt or court will declare him or her insolvent. But, legislation will creditors to agree to pay a small amount over a loan period of time, an affordable amount. There is absolutely no reason for a creditor to commit suicide as there are many Government sponsored debt consolidation programmes and agencies that will advice and help people who in debt and struggling to pay back loans. Debt consolidation programmes can ease the stress many people suffer as a result of debt.

The news way of publication is wrong actually this is what happened. The lady's husband has given Rs. 11,000,000 to his best friend without any documents and the friend has escaped to Switzerland and denied borrowing any money. That was the reason for husband's suicide. Then after she try to live with her three kids but she couldn't finally she suicide with her three kids. Even though they are foolish to give such a large amount of money without documents, just based on trust. What was the person who borrowed such large amount and escaped don't they feel guilty and how they are going to live after murdering 6 people in a row. They must be punished at any cost without any mercy
